name: The Black Death
description: Plague has left a trail of destruction across 14th century Europe. Survivors confront sickness and scarce resources in a land rife with banditry. Fight for scarce resources and learn new crafting techniques. But at all times you MUST avoid the plague. This is the land of ‘The Black Death’.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 (64bit OS) Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 (64bit OS) Processor: 3 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: Compatible GPU with 2 GB Video RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
